verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4973>seals<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%>, as it <S%G5613>were<s%> the <S%G5456>noise<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2462>horse<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G5115>bow<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he went <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G3528>conquering<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3528>conquer<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2462>horse<s%> that was <S%G4450>red<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> power was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>thereon<s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G4969>kill<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3162>sword<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>beast<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>beheld<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>lo<s%> a <S%G3189>black<s%> <S%G2462>horse<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a pair of <S%G2218>balances<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, A <S%G5518>measure<s%> of <S%G4621>wheat<s%> for a <S%G1220>penny<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G5518>measures<s%> of <S%G2915>barley<s%> for a <S%G1220>penny<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> see thou <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%>. A measure: the word choenix signifieth a measure containing one wine quart, and the twelfth part of a quart

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226>beast<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>looked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G5515>pale<s%> <S%G2462>horse<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1883>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> was <S%G2288>Death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G86>Hell<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the fourth <S%G5067>part<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4501>sword<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3042>hunger<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> the <S%G2342>beasts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>. unto them: or, to him

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of them that were <S%G4969>slain<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G2192>held<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2193>How<s%> <S%G4219>long<s%>, O <S%G1203>Lord<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true<s%>, dost <S%G2919>thou<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1556>avenge<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G575>on<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> unto every one of <S%G1538>them<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G4483>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G373>rest<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> for a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>season<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservants<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, that <S%G3195>should<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were, <S%G3739>should<s%> be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>beheld<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>lo<s%>, there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3189>black<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> of <S%G5155>hair<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G792>stars<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, even <S%G5613>as<s%> a fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G906>casteth<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> untimely <S%G3653>figs<s%>, when she is <S%G4579>shaken<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> a <S%G3173>mighty<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%>. untimely figs: or, green figs

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G673>departed<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G975>scroll<s%> when it is rolled <S%G1507>together<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> were <S%G2795>moved<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5117>places<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the great <S%G3175>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the rich <S%G4145>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the chief <S%G5506>captains<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the mighty <S%G1415>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1401>bondman<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> free <S%G1658>man<s%>, <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G4693>dens<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G4073>rocks<s%> of the <S%G3735>mountains<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4073>rocks<s%>, <S%G4098>Fall<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2928>hide<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of him that <S%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>:

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%>?
